title: Nikolai Safronidi
text:
Nikolai Afanasyevich Safronidi (, ; born 10 September 1983) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player. He is the assistant coach of <a href="FC%20Ufa">FC Ufa</a>. He played as a <a href="left%20midfielder">left midfielder</a>.
Personal life.
He is of <a href="Caucasus%20Greeks">Caucasus Greek</a> and <a href="Armenians">Armenian</a> descent.
